snippet.title: Steel Seed Gameplay Trailer – PC Gaming Show: Most Wanted 2024
snippet.description:
From the developers of Close To The Sun, Steel Seed is a sci-fi action game that blends stealth and action, in which you must battle through a vast underground facility operated by Ais. The player character, Zoe, can move through the world using acrobatic parkour, and use sneaking and stealth kills to make combat encounters easier or even avoid them entirely.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/458430/Steel_Seed/"
https://www.pcgamer.com

X: https://x.com/pcgamer

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
#pcgamer #pcgaming #PCGSMW #steelseed
